name: Jahnaviiii
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: As usual I was going to type a long paragraph wishing you happy birthday...
text2: I even starting drafting the message
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something unique and techie!
outroText: Okay, call me and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again.
